bibl.title: More than Men, Less than Gods. Studies on Royal Cult and Imperial Worship. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Organized by the Belgian School at Athens (November 1-2, 2007).
bibl.seg: Iossif Panagiotis P., Andrzej S. Chankowski and Catharine C. Lorber (Edd.), More than Men, Less than Gods. Studies on Royal Cult and Imperial Worship. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Organized by the Belgian School at Athens (November 1-2, 2007). (Studia Hellenistica. 51.)
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, Mass., Peeters, 2011. ISBN 978-90-429-2470-3.
